author: Sean Moran
title: Josh Hawley: Counter China’s Plans for Dominance by Ending ‘Forever Wars’
description: Sen. Josh Hawley (R-MO) wrote on Tuesday that the only way America can counter Chinese domination is to end the "forever wars" in Iraq and Afghanistan.
content:
Sen. Josh Hawley (R-MO) wrote on Tuesday that the only way America can counter Chinese domination is to end the “forever wars” in Iraq and Afghanistan.
Hawley said that the United States has focused more on the response to the coronavirus outbreak than the c… [+2554 chars]
